function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 due to lack of social distancing in purchasing basic necessities.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of the virus among the population.","Mitigation":"Implement a scheduling system for purchasing basic necessities to limit the number of people in stores at the same time.","Technologies":"AI and ML algorithms for scheduling and queue management.","People":"General public, particularly those purchasing basic necessities.","Owner":"Government, retailers, and technology companies."},{"Description":"Difficulty in accessing and analyzing scientific literature related to COVID-19.","Impact":"Slow progress in research and development of COVID-19 treatments and vaccines.","Mitigation":"Use AI and ML to aggregate and analyze scientific literature to make it more accessible to researchers.","Technologies":"AI and ML text analysis and data mining tools.","People":"Researchers and scientists conducting COVID-19 research.","Owner":"Research organizations and technology companies."},{"Description":"Challenges in managing supply chain and tele-health facilities during the pandemic.","Impact":"Disruption in the delivery of essential medical supplies and access to healthcare services.","Mitigation":"Implement AI and ML solutions for supply chain optimization and tele-health management.","Technologies":"Supply chain optimization algorithms, tele-health platforms.","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients, and suppliers.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government, and technology companies."}]}
